text: Nau Dāvid nehayau hasenehede wauthaunauhanaa Psalms,20.42 “Psalms” is capitalized here but not in 24:44, but both are almost certainly deliberate. As per the KJV, “Psalms” in 20:42 is the name of a book in the Bible, but in 24:44 the common noun “psalms” is meant. Vahadāde hasenehethaude Navahadāhewaunādaune, Hadjejanaugudaune hejavesanee,
